textBeforeTable: Table 1 Oracle Database XE Requirements Table 1 provides system requirements for both Oracle Database XE Server and Oracle Database XE Client. 2.1.1 System Requirements Server Component Kernel Parameter Requirements Server Component Swap Space Requirements System Requirements This section covers the following topics: 2.1 Software Requirements Configuring Your Web Browser Web Browser Requirements Permissions Requirement for Installing Oracle Database XE Software Requirements This section covers the following topics: 2 Requirements Discussion forum http://www.oracle.com/technology/xe/forum Before you can use the discussion forum, you need to register Oracle Database XE. Oracle Database XE Documentation Library http://www.oracle.com/technology/xe/documentation Oracle Database XE home page on Oracle Technology Network http://www.oracle.com/technology/products/database/xe For more information on Oracle Database XE, visit the following Web sites: Zend Core for Oracle: Download and install from: http://www.oracle.com/technology/tech/php/zendcore/index.html Install Zend Core for Oracle on Oracle Database XE Server only. It is not supported on Oracle Database XE Client. PHP: Download and install from: http://www.php.net You can install PHP on either Oracle Database XE
textAfterTable: 2.1.2 Server Component Swap Space Requirements Table 2 describes the swap space requirements for Oracle Database XE Server, depending on how much RAM your computer has. Table 2 Swap Space Requirements for Oracle Database XE Server Your Computer's RAM Swap Space Needed Between 0 and 256 megabytes 3 times the size of RAM Between 256 and 512 megabytes 2 times the size of RAM 512 megabytes and greater 1024 megabytes of RAM 2.1.3 Server Component Kernel Parameter Requirements The Oracle Database XE installation checks your system for the following kernel parameter settings. If the kernel parameters of your system are less than the values listed in Table 3, then the installation will modify the kernel parameter setting to use
